title: Constant disconnecting from Pvp.Net
body:
Can someone plays help me with my problem, that I keep dcing from Pvp.net.
It started for the most recent patch, never happened before then.
It makes it really hard to get into a game when you can't accept the game or even select a champ.
I know it is not my internet due to be able to do everything such as logging in and making this post.
Please help!

From a distressed player.
